attributes.action: Create a new requiring the government to reduce carbon dioxide emissions by 3% per year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In addition, the government should set the target of reducing CO2 emissions by 90% of 1990 levels by 2030 in order to avoid catastrophic climate change, as recommended by the latest studies into the effects of differing levels of CO2 emissions on the global climate system.
